content: **crocheted heart with string in drops cotton light theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern cluster-119 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 3 5 cm length = 19 cm with string **materials** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 17 carmine 2 hearts + string weighs approx 3 g crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge ** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
